summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating the low-stock warning theme tokens in global CSS (light and dark mode), which would make the reminder/banner and low-stock row highlights lighter/brighter assuming they already consume these tokens. No evidence of changes under the read-only shadcn UI directory or any copy changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated internal/meta tracking files not requested by the BuildRequest (project state and file summaries).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a styling/token change to make the low-stock background lighter/brighter; it does not request updating project tracking metadata or generated file summaries.
